briefTitle: A Study Of SIBP-01 Or CN-Trastuzumab Plus Docetaxel And Carboplatin In HER2 Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Single-blind Study Comparing the Efficacy, Safety, and Immunogenicity of SIBP-01 and CN-Trastuzumab Combination With Docetaxel and Carboplatin in Patients With Early or Locally Advanced Her2 Positive Breast Cancer
